org.mozilla.javascript

Interface ScriptRuntime.MessageProvider

  • Enclosing class:
    ScriptRuntime

    public static interface ScriptRuntime.MessageProvider
    This is an interface defining a message provider. Create your own implementation to override the default error message provider.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getMessage(java.lang.String messageId, java.lang.Object[] arguments)
      Returns a textual message identified by the given messageId, parameterized by the given arguments.

    • Method Detail

      • getMessage

        java.lang.String getMessage(java.lang.String messageId,
                            java.lang.Object[] arguments)
        Returns a textual message identified by the given messageId, parameterized by the given arguments.
        Parameters:
        messageId - the identifier of the message
        arguments - the arguments to fill into the message
